SLAM!
Draco woke up and hit his head on the Underside of the plane that he hid under. He was hiding in the place where the plane landing gear is stored.
He managed to get onto the plane somehow.
"Ouch! Be more Careful Draco!" Said a voice inside his head.
"Yeah, well stop being an ass so much!" He thought back.
Draco had mulitple personalities inside of him. It was strange to have that inside him.
The voice that popped up in his head just now was called Shianna. (Shy-Anna.) She was his kick ass woman. But he had never really seen it.
"You know, you should be more gratefull." Said another voice.
That one was a psycho killer inside him called Danemon. (Dan-Eh_Mon)
He didn't show very often.
"Look who is talking Mr. I wanna kill and murder everybody in sight!."
"Hey, i am just saying that it's because of us that your ass is intact. so be more grateful."
"Whatever. i just wanna find some lunch."
It had been 4 years since Draco, a dragon Guardian had been banished from his homeland simply because he was part demon. He also had other demons inside his head. As much as he wanted to wring their non-existent necks, he couldn't. First, well, they didn't have bodies, and second: They really came in handy sometimes.
"Well, i think you should just jump from the airplane and then eat a damn cow. They have some damn good meat." Said Shianna.
Well, sometimes anyway.
"Thanks for the tip captain obvious!"
"Any time ye land lubber!"
Suppressing a mental eye roll and a sigh, he forced with his mind to open the ventilator shaft that would lower the landing gear. It opened and he was astonished to find open water. He held onto the ledge with his legs and then lowered his body out into the air. It was a frigid morning.
Then again, EVERYTHING is frigid when traveling on the OUTSIDE of an F-22 Raptor that could break sound barriers.
He saw with his Raptor vision that they were about 900 miles off sea. They were traveling top-speed in the aircraft so in about five seconds, they would reach shore. He was gonna jump:

"5.4.3.2.1... NOW!"
He jumped and did a splendid dive into the water below at an altitude of 60,000 feet in the air. He hit the water with a force to kill a regular human. But Draco was no human. He was part dead so duh he couldn't die very easily.
He swam the 200 feet to shore without being attacked by sharks. He was at the coast of Hawaii. Filled with sharks these waters were. But they ALL gave him wide berth. They may be dumb carnivores, but they were not so stupid as to attack a demon. even if Draco wasn't all demon.
